sanskrit: तस्य संजनयन्हर्षं कुरुवृद्धः पितामहः| सिंहनादं विनद्योच्चैः शङ्खं दध्मौ प्रतापवान्
Translation: His glorious grandsire, the oldest of the Kauravas, roared like a lion to cheer Duryodhana and blew his conch.
answer: Bhishma roared like a lion and blew his conch to cheer up Duryodhana during the Mahabharata war.
